txt.en: Find the meeting location, a tree east of Bâr Nadhron, by the Mouths of the Entwash.
The party has met under a tree east of Bâr Nadhron by the Mouths of the Entwash.\n\nYou should hear what Gondrad has to say.
You have been set upon by Variag assailants near the Mouths of the Entwash, east of Bâr Nadhron. Defeat them and do not lead them to the meeting place.
Find the meeting location
After a close encounter with Jarl Akhiz and his men, it is time to reunite with the others.
The party has met under a tree east of Bâr Nadhron by the Mouths of the Entwash.\n\nYou should hear what Togbor has to say.
DNT survive the ambush
'Beneath a tree east of Bâr Nadhron, by the wetland's edge, is where we are to meet. Let us go - and with haste!'
Yet more Variags appear!
Find the meeting location, a tree east of Bâr Nadhron by the Mouths of the Entwash.
'We may be safe now, but I'm well acquainted with trouble and I believe we're in for more of it!'
A Recounting of the Sons

'Ah, friend! The prank your brother Narvagol played upon me has born ill fruit, indeed. \n\n'In revenge for failing to polish his armour, he hid my belongings far and wide about Ost Rimmon. You could not find me, for I was scouring the cellar, and then you left so Lady Glánhar has showered abuse without respite upon me ever since!'
You have been set upon by more Variag assailants near the Mouths of the Entwash, east of Bâr Nadhron. Defeat them and do not lead them to the meeting place.
Defeat the ambushers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'How glad I am to see old Gondrad. How glad I shall be to be home again!'
The party is under a tree east of Bâr Nadhron by the Mouths of the Entwash.\n\nYou should hear what Togbor has to say.
DNT There they are... but here comes another ambush!

'Gondrad, know that Narvagol is dead. Father lies dead by his side. Your luck was not ill but a supreme blessing, for we were taken before even the sun had reached noon that day, and you, a commoner unworthy of ransom, would not have been spared. 

'They wished to ransom all of us, of course, but Father and Narvagol sought glory instead and won it. We might have too, but the curs threw nets over us and saw us disarmed before we could cause any trouble. Then you came to our rescue, and here we are.

'All, that is, except for my brother Malhar.'
Talk to Gondrad
'He does not know. You must tell him, brother.'
DNT looks like they're gone
DNT the third brother escaped. I'm too injured. can you go into the swamps and look for hiM?
'I still say we should have fought those dishonourable dogs. Perhaps in Ost Rimmon we can muster a fighting force and come back for them!'
Talk to Togbor

'Well, we have made it out somehow, haven't we? Not... all of us.'

He grimaces and looks about him.

'Gondrad! Where in all Gondor had you got off to, and how is it you are here?'
DNT search for your friends
Talk to Togbor
Stand where you were and fight
Stand where you were and fight
DNT talk to son 1
Defeated an ambusher ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Stay and defend your allies
DNT survive again
Defeated an ambusher ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat the ambushers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT survive the ambush
Find the meeting location
Stay and defend your allies
'So we are to meet beneath a bent tree near the Mouths of the Entwash? Let us go and not linger here one worrisome moment longer!'
You are surprised by an ambush!
DNT survive the ambush
